subject: Automated Method Testing (AMT) Pattern
msgSnippet: A first-cut definition for the Automated Method Testing pattern utilizes the Core J2EE Patterns format. If you have not been exposed to AMT - I d
messageBody:
A first-cut definition for the "Automated Method Testing" pattern
utilizes the "Core J2EE Patterns" format.

If you have not been exposed to AMT - I'd appreciate any feedback on
this definition that values brevity:

http://gtcgroup.com/soaj/Road.to.SOAj.html#AMT

Feedback includes (but is not limited to):

* Clarity (Does the definition adequately explain the pattern?)
* Scope (Is the definition scoped effectively?)
* Usefulness (Does the definition promote concept discussion?)

Thanks,
Marvin
